channel.title: Netflix Roulette API Challenge
channel.description:
So to get the ball rolling and more developers creating apps with my API, I'm holding a little contest.
Create any kind of application or software using my API and whoever makes the most awesome thing will get a free week of advertising on [url=http://netflixroulette.net/]Netflix Roulette[/url] for anything they want.
Regardless if you win or not you'll be featured here
[url=http://netflixroulette.net/api/#products]Netflix Roulette API[/url]
Rules: Has to utilize the API
Have fun

item.title: Netflix Roulette API Challenge
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:542911”]I don’t really see much interest in using an API for Netflix, but I’ll be following to see what comes out of this.[/quote]First thing that comes to mind for me would be to write down a lot of shows I’ve been wanting to watch, use the API to auto-compare ratings and such to specify my viewing order.

I like watching a lot of documentaries and about half of them aren’t on Netflix, so I’d just add them all to a list and it’d find all of the ones that are actually on Netflix a lot quicker than I could myself by just searching.

I think this is at least a really cool idea if a good use-case is thought up.

Read full topic
